com.gamelanlabs.chimple2.demos

Class Demo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gamelanlabs.chimple2.core.ChimpleProgram
      • com.gamelanlabs.chimple2.demos.Demo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Anisotropic, Bezier, Bits, CompareSamplers, LatentDirichletAllocation, RandomCoin, StochasticBlockModel, Sudoku

    public abstract class Demo
extends ChimpleProgram
    Demos must implement this interface, so that they can be automated.
    Author:
    BenL
